Nooo! We go iiin! We kiiill! No more talk! We kiiill! Soon, my dog of war, but we have to do it my way. Losers! Losers wait!

Great Game. Don't get worked up over the Killer did this, Survivor does that salt mining. In fact - Just embrace it. Play your way each time on either side and don't be afraid to throw salt out. This game is the literally leading exporter of salt in the world (move over Netherlands!) so have fun with it. Only the sweaty get mad. 

Might see a few bugs here and there, some come on updates but never game breaking unless you just wanna hardcore whine about it. 

Lots of fun and neat killers and most of them are iconic horror knockoffs, some the real deal. Some survivors that come from horror genre but most I think are just created by Devs.

About 6 years into the game and they've added enough content to really sink your teeth into for a couple of months (probably longer...just depends on you) if you were to really binge on it. The compendium and Archives are up to 6 now. Each with 4 pages with both killer and survivor goals that unlock voice over story content (not bad on the voice over too. Will make you want to complete all pages before listening to it).

I tend to binge on it here and there and each time there;s always games that get my heart racing and I still get a jump scare here and there or piss myself why being chased or surprised by a killer. I LOVE playing the killer too and would side with killers in saying it is far more terrifying being a killer at rank 1 than it is being a survivor at rank 1. So stressful, lol.

10/10 - Would piss myself again.
This game teaches you how to be patient even when you are absolutely pissed off. Thank you for coming to my Ted Talk.

Too much work trying to level up, they don't give enough points and the perks/items cost too much, only reason I have any level 50s is because of event bonuses/gifts.  The leveling up system is such that you are better off using a max level to farm points, playing a low level with no perks is a joke and no fun.  Queue times are bad, as a killer you're usually up against a team thats in voice chat.  Did I say it takes too long to level up?  So spend a bunch on all the dlc and realize you're going to need hundreds, thousands of hours of play to max them.  Nope, this isn't a mmo, grinding up levels just so you can maybe be competitive in a game like this is the stupidest thing I've ever seen.  Don't waste your money

To keep it short i'll list a few things I dislike about Dead By Daylight
---------------------------------------------------------------------
1) Developers don't listen to community suggestions or what they have to say.
2) Developers don't even take feedback from PTB, or else they would have fixed lots of issues years ago.
3) It seems like the developers struggle to balance the game, or to make good perks.
4) Developers only patch long-waited problems, once their player base reaches a record low
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Overall I'm disappointed with this game. It has lots of opportunities to be a great game, but with how inexperienced the developers are, and how reluctant they are to take feedback, this game will always be a disappointment and a failure
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-10/10 would NOT recommend for every reason

Schönes Spiel mit einem guten Spielkonzept die Grafik ist komplett ausreichend. Die art des Spiels hat mich schnell überzeugt und es wird nie Langweilig weder als Killer noch als Survivor, da es eine dauerhafte abwechslung zwischen den Killern gibt und der Spielstil sich von jedem Spieler unterscheidet. Die Runden dauern ca. 10-15 min (manchmal auch länger). Daher kann man Dead by Daylight auch mal zwischen durch Spielen. Ein Großes Plus ist außerdem, dass es auch über Crossplay funktioniert daher kann man mit jedem Freund/in Spielen egal ob Pc oder PS4/5.
Leider gab es seit dem vorletzten Patch ein paar Bugs die Teilweise genervt haben, dabei wurden die meisten aber bereits behoben.
ich Empfele Dead by Daylight also sehr

I used to love the game, but the updates from 2021 are just trash...
In summer 2020 the game was pretty solid, the mechanics all seemed to work and playing was fun both as killer and survivor... but then it happened:

First things first, the new HUD: 
This is (in my opinion a pretty unnecessary feature implemented, but it`s okay if you scale it down. ( makes DBD look a mobilegame though)
2nd the hits: 
so in DBD history hits were a problem pretty often but by summer 2020 it was actually more or less playable again. But in the first 2021 Update htey wre so broken again that I got so annoyed, I abandoned the game for a month. They kind of fixed it again but you still get hit through windows pretty often. (on hits that shouldn`t connect)
And last but not least the thing that annoyes me the most: the new movement and animation mechanichs.
This is a big "WHY???!" in my opinion. The animations that feel like they´ve been there since day 1 were removed and all the old movement mechanichs too. 360´s and survivor moonwalks have just been killed by it ... and the animations dont look better than the old ones (of course thats just my opinion and if you like them thats okay).
Afterall because of the latest updates, players that wanted to play some regular old DBD were spit in their faces...

Много читеров, много токсиков, каждая вторая катка против нюрсы, баг репорты улетают непонятно куда, надо ли вообще тратить время на это? В общем я удалил игру, вернусь возможно когда понерфят нюрсу или вовсе выкинут её из игры. Ман который игнорирует механику игры - это бред полный. С каждым годом нюрсаводов всё больше и больше, нет сил уже терпеть это.
P.S. Я всё ещё играю в это дерьмо (потому как других вариков нет), и того разраба кто придумал нюрсу надо посадить на деревянный член.

o jogo ja foi bom, mas a behavior ta cagando para a comunidade e os jogadores, principalmente os brasileiros, vamos lá ao que interessa o jogo em si é quase um pega pega da vida, mas ultmamente, a behavior fez o favor de deixar o hit basico do killer bugado demais, o braço de alguns killers estão indo a mais de 2 metros de distancia, sim se vai ver um cara com uma navalha dando um hit como se tivesse de facão, toda vez q eles soltam uma atualização, o seu jogo buga e não se esqueçam que não adianta mandar ticket pra behavior caso o seu jogo continue caindo, eles vão falar que é algo normal e não vão remover o seu ban de 24 horas, o balanceamento do jogo, ta todo cagado tá! sim muito cagado o killer ta mais op que tudo, ah e sem contar os hackers que tem no jogo, que eles não fazem questão de banir, raramente vc vai ver mas quando ver a vontade de quitar e processar a empresa vem na mente, o jogo só fica bom se vc nao tiver oq fazer tipo, pega 5 amigos e abre uma partida personalizada, pq jogar com outros jajaja ou nego de console não da, SIMPLESMENTE NÃO DÁ!

Dead by Daylight sigh...right now i am on a break playing this game. I dont feel the fun and scary experience as I once had. That doesnt mean its a bad game though. Even though it has Spaghetti codes it is a game with nice mechanics and really enjoyable character (Except for the cannibal piece of shit). Playing as a Killer lets you feel really powerful. As a Survivor on the other Hand it feels like you have the control over the Killer which is contradicting itself.  Disclaimer: This is a standpoint of someone who understands this game and is quite decent. At some points if you are against a full 4 Man squad as a Killer who isnt exactly strong, you might just give up and search for a new lobby. At certain times of the Day the queuetime for a lobby might get you to think that this game is a lobby Simulator. But it really can be fun but i just lost my motivation, it does not mean the game is trash i just have to move on. Now lets look at this from an Achievement Hoe perspective. To get 100% at least for the 3 Months before a new Chapter comes out and new Achievement are born, You need to spend money, its unavoidable. There are a few licensed Character which can only be bought by purchasing real money. As for the Achievements itself. Expcept for a few disgusting ones its really enjoyable to collect them all. I would give this game a 8/10.

The game has potential to be "THE BEST" horror game out there but sadly not until the developers start listening to the people who actually play the game instead of realizing ideas which they think its good for the game that they don't understand nor play.

Regardless the game can be fun IF YOU PLAY IT WITH FRIENDS but if u choose to play killer u will surely have fun in the beginning till u reach a point where u will be playing against survivors running the exact same perks every single game and u will be forced to grind and unlock perks which take about one or two hundreds of hours in order to fully unlock a single killer's full potential and still get looped till daylight or u press Alt+F4  after realizing how survivor sided the game is unless u choose to main "The Nurse" which is the most overpowered killer.

And last but not least ill be lying if i say the majority of the community is nice considering in the high mmr all u get in the end game chat is salt no matter the outcome of the game.
